DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: An unique name for the time series.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: A text description of the data that the series represents.

DocAttribute.Name: StartTime
DocAttribute.Documentation: The start time of a time series.

DocAttribute.Name: EndTime
DocAttribute.Documentation: The end time of a time series.

DocAttribute.Name: DataOrigin
DocAttribute.Documentation: The origin of a time series data.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedDataOrigin
DocAttribute.Documentation: Value of the data origin if DataOrigin attribute is USERDEFINED.

DocAttribute.Name: Unit
DocAttribute.Documentation: The unit to be assigned to all values within the time series. Note that mixing units is not allowed. If the value is not given, the global unit for the type of _IfcValue_, as defined at _IfcProject.UnitsInContext_ is used.

DocAttribute.Name: HasExternalReference
